title: Learn the Scale of the Universe!
description: Discover how vast the universe is by exploring the scale of celestial objects. Prepare to be amazed!

title: Listen to Your Birthday Song
description: Find out what song ruled the charts on the day you were born. It's a trip down memory lane!

title: Make a Collage from Your Photo
description: Turn your photos into vibrant collages or eye-catching avatars. Let your creativity run wild!

title: Create Funny Mixes
description: Craft amazing music mixes and share your unique tracks with friends. Let the beats flow!

title: Draw a Stickman
description: Revisit your childhood doodles by drawing a stickman and embarking on whimsical adventures. Let your imagination soar!

title: Help to End Hunger
description: Test your knowledge while making a difference. For each correct answer, rice is donated to the hungry. Game for good!

title: Make Everything OK
description: Click the magic button to instantly make everything OK. It's like a digital reset button for your day!

title: Build Balls
description: Fill the playing space with balls and avoid obstacles in this addictive game. Can you master the challenge?

title: Listen to the Rain
description: Immerse yourself in the soothing sound of rain. It's the perfect backdrop for relaxation and reflection!

title: The Wiki Game
description: The Wiki Game: This game is based on the exploration of Wikipedia articles. It gives you a starting article and an ending article, and your goal is to navigate from one to the other by only clicking on internal Wikipedia links. There are five modes: fastest, fewest clicks, exactly six clicks, no using United States as a link, and five clicks to Jesus.

title: GeoGuesser
description: This game uses Street View to take you to locations all over the world, and your goal is to look around and guess where you are by placing a pin on a world map. Your score depends on how close your guess is to the actual location. There are several different maps that you can pick to limit the range of possible locations.

title: Make Some Sick Beats
description: They even have matching visuals to complement the sounds. Jam out with your friends for a guaranteed good time!

title: Play SuperNintendo in-browser
description: Listen, I can't tell you how legal this site is, or how long it'll be up. But it has a bunch of SNES games (as well as games from other systems, but let's be honest, SNES is the GOAT) that are playable right in your browser. It ran a little slow for me in Chrome, but Flash-friendly browsers might run smoother.

title: Look for ridiculously expensive dream homes on real estate sites.
description: Obviously I'm never going to buy a 12-bedroom, 24-bathroom home in Beverly Hills for $135 million, but that won't stop me from checking out the listing and trashing the owner's décor choices like I'm on House Hunters. Zillow, Redfin, and Realtor.com are a few popular sites to try.

title: Read a Classic Book Online
description: Project Gutenberg has a huge selection of books that are in the public domain, including novels like Pride and Prejudice or plays like The Importance of Being Earnest. Most of the books are available in various formats, like Kindle files, PDFs, or plain ol' HTML.

title: Read some really funny webcomics
description: XKCD is pretty great if you love science, and Hark! A Vagrant is perfect for literary/history nerds. Or, you could try Oglaf, which is TOTALLY, COMPLETELY NSFW but often hilarious if you love the fantasy genre.

title: Use the Internet Archive Wayback Machine to see what your favorite sites looked like in the past.
description: If you're ever feeling nostalgic about the internet, check out Archive.org's Wayback Machine, which lets you see what a website looked like on a specific date in the past. For example, the above screenshot is what Amazon looked like on Feb. 22, 2008. Look at that early Kindle! And the T-Mobile Curve with a QWERTY keypad!

title: Play an updated, multiplayer version of Snake with Slither.io.
description: Hey, remember that snake game you used to play on your Nokia phone? If you're under 25, you probably don't, but trust me when I say that this is a lot like it. In this game, your snake gets bigger as you eat glowing dots, and you're in an arena with other online players whose snakes might be much bigger than yours.

title: Learn to insult people like Shakespeare
Find the Invisible Cow
description: You’re going to want to make sure your sound is on in this fun-finding game! Find the invisible cow in this laugh-out-loud version of 'hot and cold.'

title: MapCrunch
description: This site gives you a random Google map from anywhere in the world and all you have to do is explore.

title: The Useless Web
description: Want to see what the Internet truly has to offer? Take a peek at The Useless Web to see what truly is out there.

title: Hacker Typer
description: Want to feel like you’re in The Matrix? Or at least feel like a super cool computer hacker trying to break into some evil lair? Just open up this site and pound the keyboard away!

title: Paper Toilet
description: Have fun wasting toilet paper without a care in the world on this interactive site.

title: ChatGPT
description: If you're looking for some good ideas or just some simple entertainment, go onto ChatGPT—you can ask it anything, including any of these 101+ ChatGPT prompts.

title: Pointer Pointer
description: Looking to really get lost in the quirky and weird? Look at this site and expect a few chuckles!

title: Wordle
description: If you're not still doing Wordle, it's a great time to start up again.

title: Staggering Beauty
description: Make the virtual worm dance with your mouse when you click on this fun website! Warning: this site does contain flashing images that may trigger some viewers.

title: Scream Into the Void
description: This website invites you to get it all out. Take out all your outrage about any situation in your life and hit the scream button which throws it all out into the void.

title: Duotrigordle
description: Solve 32 Wordle puzzles at once on this site!

title: Don't Even Reply
description: If you want a good chuckle (or some commiserating validation), check out Don’t Even Reply and read some real-life emails that are side-splittingly funny. We recommend starting off with Angry Fish Tank Guy!

title: Stellarium
description: If you live in a big city or an area filled with light pollution, it’s probably been a hot minute since you’ve seen a night sky full of stars. Take a peek at this online planetarium to see which constellations and planets are out tonight!

title: Shut Up and Take My Money
description: Take your online shopping obsession to the next level with this fun website filled with cool gadgets and gizmos! This is also perfect to start shopping for unique stocking stuffers and fun little gifts for the holidays.
This website takes the best parts of elementary school math and Tetris and combines them into this fun game of 2048! Using your arrow keys, try combining numbers until you reach the sequence 2048.

title: Wikipedia’s List of Individual Dogs
description: Did you ever want to know what Air Bud’s real name is? Or learn about the heartwarming tale of Greyfriars Bobby? Waste away your boredom and be tickled pink when you scroll through this fun website full of famous individual dogs!

title: Zoom Quilt
description: If you’re looking to bide some time while having a hypnotizing experience, check out this fun website where a picture infinitely zooms in to create and reveal new pictures.

title: Astronomy Picture of the Day
description: Discover the cosmos from the best of the best with NASA’s astronomy picture of the day! You’ll get to see a stunning photo of space while also learning something with the explorative caption underneath.

title: MuscleWiki
description: Fine-tune your workout with this fun website, MuscleWiki. It not only gives you a full diagram of the muscles in your body but how to stretch and work them out!

title: Duolingo
description: Make the most of your free time and cross something off your bucket by becoming fluent in a different language with the help of Duolingo! This fun website also doubles as a fun free app on your phone so you never miss a lesson.

title: Internet Live Stats
description: You commonly hear the phrase everyone is on the internet but how many are there really? Find out how many tweets, Instagram posts, and emails are being sent in real-time!

title: Hubski
description: Get fun and offbeat conversation topics with the help of Hubski! You’ll find different forums of thoughtful and unique conversations that will be a smash hit with friends.

title: This Is Sand
description: Everyone remembers the fun sand art smash hit craft of the 90s. Now, you can recreate priceless childhood memories in digital form! Just simply drag your mouse to make digital colorful sand art.

title: Lizard Point
description: Geography not your best subject in school? Lizard Point makes learning fun with virtual quizzes that help you broaden your horizons without all the stress of tests and final exams.

title: Radio Garden
description: Ever wanted to hear what the radio was like in Paris or in Tokyo? Travel through the airwaves and see what is playing in local cities (literally any city) in real time.

title: Music Theory
description: Learn the language behind your favorite pieces of music with this fun website! They offer free lessons and exercises so you have all you need to become the next musical genius.

title: Radiooooo
description: Take a step back in time with Radiooooo. Like the Radio Garden website, you can choose any region in the world and listen to the local airwaves. However, this site gives you a timeline so you can listen to the radio from not just anywhere, but anywhen in time! Have fun listening to 1960s French bops.

title: Sleepytime
description: Is your sleeping schedule out of whack? This fun website calculates exactly when you need to go to sleep and wake up in order to get a good night’s sleep.

title: Passive Aggressive Password Machine
description: If you ever wanted to know how strong your password is, simply type it into this machine and it will tell you what you need to work on!

title: CodeCademy
description: Why not pick up something new? Code Academy offers coding lessons with immediate feedback and real-world projects.

title: 29a.ch
description: Paint the cosmos with all the colors of the wind with this fun interactive creative site! It’s a great and mesmerizing way to relax and chill out after a long day.

title: Live Kitten Cam
description: Fill your heart with absolute joy and forget about the world with this fun website that streams from a live webcam set up at Kitten Rescue Sanctuary in Los Angeles! Worried that you’ll be looking into an empty room? Don’t worry, they always have cute baby kittens either snuggling, playing and being overall adorable.

title: Step into a time machine and go back 10 years to play Flappy Bird online.
description: Relive the nostalgia of the early 2010s by playing Flappy Bird online, the addictive game that took the world by storm!

title: Join Letterboxd and log all of the movies you've seen.
description: Create an account on Letterboxd and start logging all the movies you've watched. It's a great way to keep track of your cinematic journey!

title: Learn to Code with The Odin Project
description: Embark on a journey to become a proficient web developer with The Odin Project. It offers free, open-source coding curriculum covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more.

title: FreeCodeCamp
description: Join a global community of learners and developers on FreeCodeCamp. Learn to code for free with interactive lessons, projects, and certifications.

title: Codecademy
description: Start your coding journey with Codecademy. Learn to code interactively, for free, and at your own pace with hands-on projects.

title: TED Talks
description: Expand your horizons with TED Talks. Watch inspiring and thought-provoking talks from experts in various fields, covering a wide range of topics.

title: edX
description: Access thousands of online courses from top universities and institutions on edX. Learn new skills or deepen your knowledge with courses in various subjects.

title: CS50x - Introduction to Computer Science
description: Take Harvard's renowned CS50x course online for free. Learn the fundamentals of computer science and programming through this engaging and challenging course.

title: Nordic Larp Wiki
description: Explore the world of live-action role-playing games (LARP) with the Nordic Larp Wiki. Discover resources, articles, and insights into this unique form of storytelling.

title: Little Alchemy 2
description: Combine different elements to create new ones in this addictive and fun game. Explore the vast world of Little Alchemy 2 and see what creations you can come up with!
